title: 820-01041 not turning on
message:
Good morning, this mac was shorted on capacitor C9087, replaced it, solved the short, but the mac still won't turn on.
   I tried to restore in DFU mode, but it gives an error when restoring. 

Voltage: 
PP1V2_AWAKE 1.2V
PP1V8_AWAKE 1,8V
PPVDDCPU_AWAKE 0.754V
PP0V8_SLPS2R 0.79V
PP1V8_SLPS2R 1.8V
PPBUS_G3H 12.6V
PP1V1_UPC_XB_LDO_BMC 0V / diode 0.525V
PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOD 1,8V
PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO 3,35V
PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOA 1,8V
PP2V5_NAND_SSD0 0V / diode 0.367V


[ATTACH type="full"]59950[/ATTACH]

title: 820-01041 not turning on
message: Bad SSD I suppose; T2 cannot access its partition...

title: 820-01041 not turning on
message:
Diode mode to ground at PPBUS_G3H?
Any liquid sign near U9000/80?

title: 820-01041 not turning on
message:

Any liquid sign near U9000/80?

Yes, there are signs of oxidation U9080, L9081, C9086, and C9080.
